modName: DVS - Player Essential Wounds and Team Death
summary: The objective of this mod is to make the Skyrim death system less annoying, more immersive, less centered in the death of the player and more oriented to the defeat of your team of warriors. This gives to you chances to fall in combat without dying, Wounds when you fall, and Game over if all of your follower's its on ground.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#f1c232][color=#f4f4f4][size=6][b]DVS - Player Essential, Wounds and Team Death[/b][/size][/color]
[/color][/center]

[size=3] English is not my first language and its the first time i write something in English. because of this description will be full of error.

 The objective of this mod is to make the Skyrim death system less annoying, more immersive, less centered in the death of the player and more directed to the defeat of all your team of warriors. After we install mods that add multiple follower the game battles start to be very fun but at same time makes the player be the primary reason to the game over, a follower can fall multiple times (this mod change this) but if the player fall its the end. Sometimes we lose a battle that the Team will sure win, because of a arrow hit in our character. another problem is if you have mods that increase the difficulty, if every hit is a kill its almost impossible to increase the armor and block skills without lowering the difficulty. [/size]
 
[i][b][size=4]Attention:[/size][/b][/i] [size=3] This is a v1.02 much things will change in the future versions. [/size]


[size=4][size=5][b]Player Essential[/b][/size] [/size] 
[size=3] ﻿ Every midnight you will receive a random number of chances  to rise in the day (not cumulative between 4 and 8). if you fall more than this number during the day its game over.
﻿You can choose if you lose a chance to rise every time you fall in combat or only when battle that you have fall as ended. (toggled in configuration menu)
[/size]
[size=5][b]Player On Ground 
[/b][/size] [size=3] ﻿Every time you fall in combat you need to wait  ( + or - ) 10 seconds to rise, while this  the camera will be switched to a random follower.[/size]

[size=5][b]Wounds[/b] [/size]
[size=3] ﻿You can choose if you will receive a wound every time you fall or in the end of combat. In this moment you will have random level of wound and pain, you will need to use potions to cure this wounds, this potions can be bought in the alchemist and misc stores, or can be created in a cooking pot.  
     
[size=5][b]Special Wounds[/b] [/size]
[size=3] ﻿Now every time you fall as a random chance to happen a special wound, this wound will incapacitate or damage the player in real time. the effect can be removed with a potion created in cooking pot.  The wound can be:

  ﻿[b]Blind[/b]:  Your optic nerve is damaged. the screen will become black for 2 minutes. can be instant cured with potion  [/size]

﻿[b]Cannot Walk[/b]: Your Spinal nerve is damaged, you will try to rise but will fail for 2 minutes.

﻿[b]Magic[/b]: [size=3]Your Magic Control Nerve is damaged. you will receive damage from your magic for [size=3]5 minutes.[/size][/size]

[/size]  go to image section to have a better information.


[size=5][b]Team Death[/b] [/size]
[size=3] ﻿This mod tracks the followers that are with you in combat. if all of your follower fall with you its game over, even if you have chances to fall and rise during this day. (toggled in configuration menu)[/size]

[size=5][b]Follower On Ground[/b][/size]
[size=3] ﻿Your follower after knocked out will stay on ground for a very long time, you can recover him using a healing spell, but it only work after some time. After the battle ends the follower will recover.[/size]

[size=5][b]Vampire System[/b] [/size]
[size=3] ﻿As a vampire you cannot fall during the day time, even if in the interiors. if you fall its game over, but will not receive wounds. (toggled in configuration menu)

[size=5][b]Instantaneous[/b][/size][size=5][b] Death[/b][/size]
﻿Activate this to have a little chance to be killed when you fall in combat, to always have the felling that you can die at any moment.

[size=5][b]Configuration Spell[/b][/size]
   When you start the mod will be added to your power inventory the spell:   DVS - Player Essential Config Menu  activating this spell you can configure the mod the way you like.
    If you start this mod in a new game with another mods that add spells, as a little chance for this spell not be added to your inventory. if this happen wait until the midnight and the spell will be added to your inventory .
   if you cannot call the menu via the spell use the console command          [size=3]set TD_MENU to 1          wait 30 seconds in real life and the menu will show up[/size]. the wait is needed to make the script  not affect the performance of the game [size=4][size=3]    Thanks to user     [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/360487]balck3821[/url]     that found the bad configuration i have made in the [size=4][size=3]lesser power[/size][/size] that prevented  the menu [/size][size=3]to show up [size=4]in the[/size][/size][/size][size=4] screen[/size] for some users, so its a high chance that the configuration power will work  to everyone ( its hard for me to test because the power always worked fine on my pc  )

[b][size=4] Incompatibility:[/size][/b]

[size=3] The follower mod i use is Amazing Follower Twaeks So i give support for compatibility only to this follower mod. But i think it will work with any other follower mod.

 This mod don't change any record, script, global or anything in vanilla skyrim and don't use assets of any other mod. Is compatible with almost any mod that you have. only have some little incompatibility's with camera mods.

 This mod is incompatible with mods that change the player Death system,  like

﻿[size=4][b]Death Alternative[/b][/size] - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45894/
﻿[size=4][b]Sm Player Essential[/b][/size] - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16311/

 if you have the mod Enhanced Camera go to

 (Skyrim Install Directory) \Data\SKSE\Plugins\ and edit the file SKSE_EnhancedCamera.ini

and change this line:
[/size][size=3] Use ctrl + F to find it faster.

    bFirstPersonScripted=1

to this:

    bFirstPersonScripted=0


 If you don't change this line the camera switch to follower in combat will not work.  [/size]


[i][b][size=4] Know Bugs and fixes:[/size][/b][/i]

[size=3] I have played the entire Dawnguard dlc and another quests and not have noticed crash or any severe bug, all the bugs below are simple and don't to crash or cause anything more dangerous like corrupt save.

 For some bug fix this mod use a console command:

 Bat FF

 it load txt file that come with the mod to fix some bugs.

==============
 The player is stuck when he rise:

 this happen when the player is knockout and fall of some edge or its trowed away. to fix this open the console command and type:

  Bat FF
 
  The Player will fall and rise and you have control over him again


===========================
 The player cannot open crafting menus or activate things like siting or bookshelf:

 i don't know the reason to this, but its very rare. To fix this open the console command and type:

  Bat FF

  The Player will fall an rise and you will gain control and activate objects again.

====================
 Bat FF not working

 This mod as a file called  FF.txt   inside your skyrim data folder, if the file its not there you can create a new one.

 create a new text file with notepad and copy and paste:

 set TD_Force_Fall to 1.0

 save the text file in your skyrim data directory naming it to

 FF

 Or anything you like.( the final name will be FF.txt ) When you are playing skyrim and some of the bug above happen, open the console and write:

 Bat FF

or

 bat  "file name"

replace the "file name" with the name of the text file you have created and saved in your skyrim data folder.


====================
 The Camera Don't Change To Follower.

 this can happen for various  reasons, one is the Camera Mods like enhanced camera, to fix this go to incompatibility section above, another is that some magick effects stop this function to work correct like poison, fire, and some enchantments.. Effects that stay damaging the player for a long time blocks the camera switch. after the effect disappear the camera will go to the follower.

==========
[s]  When the player fall is unequipped spells and shout

 reequip it again they will work[/s]

 fixed in version v1.01
=========
 When the player fall when blocking, running he stay in that stance

 click button and of the action he are doing before fall to cancel that action.
 
=======
 Sometimes the Team Death System not call game over when all followers are on ground

 I trying to find a fix to this, but its nothing that will crash or break your gameplay.

=======================
The player is not falling

 Increase the speed of the script in the config menu
